# RSA3
> `-`

## About the Challenge
We were given a file that contain 2 modulus, public exponent, and 2 ciphertexts

```
n1 = 

e1 = 65537

c1 = 


n2 = 

e2 = 65537

c2 = 
```

## How to Solve?
In this case im using [X-RSA](https://github.com/X-Vector/X-RSA) to recover the plaintext, and because then choose the 14th option
